summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West Elmgrove Street, from 35th Avenue Southwest, to California Avenue; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8972 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
